epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) for Secure Login
description: As a user, I want multi-factor authentication for logging in, so that my account has an additional layer of security.
attributes_and_rules: Apply MFA methods such as SMS, email, or authentication app.
acceptance_criteria: MFA is enabled and required during login for all users.
test_cases: Given a user logs in, When they enter their credentials, Then they are prompted for MFA.

epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
title: Implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
description: As an administrator, I want role-based access control, so that users can only access services based on their profiles.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure users can only view and manage specific services based on their role.
acceptance_criteria: RBAC is implemented, and users can only access services permitted by their roles.
test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, When they log in, Then they can access only the services allowed by their role.

title: Create Personalized Dashboard based on User Profile
description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see relevant banking products and services based on my profile.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard shows products and services according to user’s eligibility and profile segmentation.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard content adapts to user's profile and shows relevant information.
test_cases: Given a user logs into the portal, When they view the dashboard, Then it displays personalized banking products and services.

title: Ensure Responsive Design across Devices
description: As a user, I want a responsive design, so that the portal performs consistently on all my devices.
attributes_and_rules: UI should adapt to desktop, tablets, and mobile devices.
acceptance_criteria: Portal layout adjusts seamlessly across different devices.
test_cases: Given a user accesses the portal on various devices, When they navigate through pages, Then the layout and usability remain consistent.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Management Workflows
title: Implement Digital Account Opening Workflow
description: As a user, I want a guided account opening workflow, so that I can open a new bank account online easily.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow should include minimal inputs and real-time validation.
acceptance_criteria: Guided workflow for account opening with automated data prefill is available.
test_cases: Given a user initiates account opening, When they follow the guided workflow, Then they can open an account with minimal inputs and real-time validation.

title: Allow Secure Document Uploads via Portal
description: As a user, I want to upload and manage documents securely, so that I can submit required documentation for banking processes.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure secure file transmission and encrypted storage.
acceptance_criteria: Users can securely upload, review, and manage documents within the portal.
test_cases: Given a user needs to upload documents, When they use the portal, Then the files are securely transmitted and stored.

title: Develop Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
description: As a user, I want real-time notifications and tracking for my requests, so that I stay informed about their status.
attributes_and_rules: Include visual progress indicators and notifications via email and in-app alerts.
acceptance_criteria: Users receive real-time notifications and can track request status.
test_cases: Given a user submits a request, When it progresses through stages, Then they receive real-time notifications and can view status updates.

epic_title: Customer Interaction History and Activity Logs
title: Implement Comprehensive Interaction History Module
description: As a user, I want to view my interaction history, so that I can track all my activities and requests on the portal.
attributes_and_rules: Logs all customer activities and ensures compliance with audit and privacy requirements.
acceptance_criteria: Users can view a complete history of their portal interactions securely.
test_cases: Given a user is on the portal, When they view their interaction history, Then all activities and requests are logged and accessible securely.

title: Integrate Portal with Core Banking System
description: As a user, I want real-time data synchronization with the bank’s core systems, so that I have up-to-date information on my accounts and transactions.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure secure, real-time bidirectional data exchange.
acceptance_criteria: Portal integrates with core banking system and ensures real-time data synchronization.
test_cases: Given a user accesses their account, When they view account information, Then data is synchronized in real-time with the core banking system.

epic_title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
title: Deploy Optimized Database for Portal Operations
description: As an administrator, I want an optimized dedicated database, so that the portal operations are performant and scalable.
attributes_and_rules: Include optimized indexing, caching, load balancing, and security measures.
acceptance_criteria: Dedicated database is deployed with optimization for portal operations.
test_cases: Given the portal is accessed by multiple users, When performing operations, Then the database handles requests efficiently with optimized performance.

epic_title: Security, Compliance, and Data Protection Framework
title: Implement Comprehensive Security and Compliance Measures
description: As an administrator, I want rigorous security and compliance measures, so that the portal meets regulatory standards and secures user data effectively.
attributes_and_rules: Include encryption, regular vulnerability scans, compliance with GDPR and PCI DSS.
acceptance_criteria: Security and compliance measures are implemented and regularly monitored.
test_cases: Given the portal is operational, When performing vulnerability scans and audits, Then it meets all regulatory standards and protects user data effectively.
